```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#Set the working directory 
setwd('C:/Users/mcgr323/projects/whondrs_microbes/')
data_file <- 'Processed_Clean_S19S_Water_Field_sediments_9-29_Data.csv'
mol_file <- 'Processed_Clean_S19S_Water_Field_sediments_9-29_Mol.csv'

#Load WHONDRS S19S data (presence/absence)
data <- read.csv(data_file)

#Load WHONDRS S19S molarity data 
mol <- read.csv(mol_file)
```

```{r}
#Change column header 
names(data)[1] <- "Mass"

mol_subset <- mol %>% select(Mass, MolForm)
```

```{r}
#Make first column rownames
jointdataset <- merge(data, mol_subset, by= 0)
```
